𓀗 ≈ 𓀘 ⋍ 𓀓 𓂢 Greis γέρων

𓎡 𓎛 𓎡 𓎛 𓀗 | old | ghiero gero
𓎡 𓎛 𓎡 𓎛 𓀘 | become old | GERO duplication ⇔ gebrechlich Krücke

A20 𓀘 senior 𓀘 #SR 𓀙 :

𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓏲 𓏏 𓀘 𓀀 𓏥 ≈ Senioren : 𓍲 𓈖 𓏌 𓅱 𓏏 𓀭 𓏪 | entourage | Senatoren

𓎡 𓊃 𓀘 | bend down, bow down, be prostrate | kusch ⇔ greis
